name: as-sys
description: An Agent-Skills (i.e. Entity-Component) System JavaScript library.

scripts.build: rollup -c && export VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'` && sed -E -e "s/\{\{VERSION\}\}/$VERSION/" as-sys.js | uglifyjs -b indent_level=2 -o as-sys.temp.js && mv -f as-sys.temp.js as-sys.js
scripts.pretest: npm run build && rsync node_modules/jasmine-core/lib/jasmine-core/*.js test/libs && rsync node_modules/jasmine-core/lib/jasmine-core/*.css test/libs && rsync node_modules/lodash/core*.js test/libs
scripts.prepublish: npm test && uglifyjs as-sys.js -mc --ie8 --keep-fnames -o as-sys.min.js && chmod a-w as-sys.js as-sys.min.js && zip as-sys.js.zip LICENSE as-sys.js as-sys.min.js
scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git tag -am "Release $VERSION." ${VERSION} && git push --tags
